mapper.sql: id, name, remarks, state, beginDate, endDate, createDate
mapper.update:
update assessment
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR},
beginDate = #{begindate,jdbcType=DATE},
endDate = #{enddate,jdbcType=DATE},
createDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update assessment set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=CHAR}, beginDate = #{begindate,jdbcType=DATE}, endDate = #{enddate,jdbcType=DATE}, createDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
